data.title: Cory Bruce Share A Story - Springfield, Missouri
data.meta_description: Cory Matthew Bruce 28, Springfield, Missouri, passed away Saturday, November 25, 2017, in Springfield, Missouri.   He was born May 21, 1989, in Springfield, Missouri.  Cory was preceded in death by his grandparents Janice and Leroy Bruce, his aunt Vicki Bruce, and a nephew Baby Denny Bruce.  Survivors include his mother, Karen Bruce; his father, Harold Peck; his wife, Michelle Eynouf; one daughter, Adalynn Bruce; one son, Landen Bruce;  and two sisters, Cissy Bruce and Quincyann Bruce.  Visitation will be held from 2 to 4 p.m. Friday, December 1, 2017, in Herman H. Lohmeyer Funeral Home, 500 E. Walnut Street, Springfield.  Memorial services will follow the visitation at 4:00 p.m. in the Herman H. Lohmeyer Chapel.  Permanent online condolences, stories and photos may be shared at www.hhlohmeyer.com .
data.text:
Sharing a Story

This section allows family and friends to share their own special stories.

Note: The story will not appear in the Book of Memoriesâ„¢ until approved by the funeral home or family.

Step #1 - Enter your name and email address into the proper fields.

Step #2 - Select a currently available photo from those shown, or upload your own.

Step #3 - Write a title for your story.

Step #4 - Type or cut/paste your story in the text box.

Step #5 - Click "Preview".
